headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Rise As Rate Jitters Meet Soft Jobs
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Wednesday, Jan, 21 2026 US stock futures are pointing higher this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts up about 0.4%, as investors juggle rising borrowing costs and cooling job momentum. The 10 year US Treasury yield has surged to 4.29%, which means mortgages, car loans, and corporate borrowing can all become more expensive. At the same time, ADP private payrolls data show hiring in December 2025 slowed to around 8,000 new jobs per week, hinting...
